attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
its now time that the royal mail was put into private hands and give it to someone who can operate a service to the public which royal mail cannot do,i am fed up of my mail going missing or being put through the wrong address i wonder how many other people feel the same way, we need to have back the second delivery instead of just having the one delivery, with strikes looming royal mail do not deserve to have the rights to deliver any mail,
get rid of the royal mail once and for all
